title: Anilist Scrobbler
slogan:
Add automatically your anime
to your AniList.
privacy_slogan: Your data is always at home
first_catch:
You only need to login to Anilist
with their official api.
second_catch:
That's it !
Your anime will be automatically added.
content_fblock: The extension is working with Crunchyroll, Wakanim, ADN, hulu.tv & Netflix. Other sites are incoming.
content_sblock:
1.9.2 (gamma) :
Working with ADN, Crunchyroll, Wakanim.tv, Netflix & Hulu
Bug fixes
content_tblock: We respect your preferences in terms of anime, no statistics are retrieved and all calls to API are maked with your Internet connection, at no moment your informations was saved in our servers, the servers are just here to pass the access token (note : you can also use alternative auth to use your own Client ID/Secret).
images: Images : DioMédéa, Doga Kobo, SILVER LINK., Kyoto Animation, Crunchyroll (distribution in France)
respective_owners: The pictures belong to their respective owners.
